greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=0, a(1)=4; for n > 1, a(n) = 18*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + 8.
comment: The old definition given for this sequence was "Sequence allows us to find X values of the equation: X(X + 1) - 5*Y^2 = 0".
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (19,-19,1).
program: (MAGMA) I:=[0,4,80]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 18*Self(n-1)-Self(n-2)+8: n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 24 2018
results.author: _Mohamed Bouhamida_, Nov 14 2007
